summary: An ordinance providing for the modification and subdivision of certain local improvement assessments against portions of Tracts 29 and 39, Plat of Alki Point now platted as Olson's Land Company's 4th Addition, levied for the improvement of 60th Avenue Southwest and 61st Avenue Southwest, by watermains, under Ordinance No. 39289, creating Local Improvement District No. 3187.
